{"body": {"name": "DevHub Fin Ops 07/15/2024 - 07/26/2024", "summary": "Oversee that proposals flow thru the payment process efficiently. Recommend new procedures to improve the proposal payment process.", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": null, "description": "Audit and reconciliation of 2024 DevHub proposals submitted for payment processing.  I audit the current system in place, audit the records as they currently exist, propose improvements based on my findings, collaborate to implement an improved process and serve as the ongoing liason between DevHub contributors and NF as it relates to proposal payment processing.\\\\n\\\\nWeek #6 07/15/24 - 07/19/24 \\\\n07/16/24 - CRM updates \\\\n07/17/24 - Payment updates \\\\nTotal 5.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nWeek #7 07/22/24 - 07/26/24 \\\\n07/22/24 - TG w/Ori & Dan, Ops email login\\\\n07/23/24 - Research proposal issues, Emails \\\\n07/24/24 - Payments updates, Events updates \\\\n07/25/24 - Meeting w/Ori, CRM updates, email response, Slack w/Natasha \\\\nTotal 6 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal 11.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nResults:\\\\n2024 proposals are reconciled between DevHub portal and CRM. Proposals are flowing timely. New T&C have been implemented eliminating the need to create Ironclad contracts. KYC/B steps during the payment process have been eliminated, which drastically cut down on the steps necessary and the staff necessary to process a proposal payment. \\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 11.5 \\\\nRate: $80/hour\\\\n$920.00\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nRate determination is below the low end of the average hourly contract rate ($87 - $162) for an accountant with the same years of experience. That average rate does not account for my 5 years of blockchain specific experience. I\\\\\\'m not fulfilling all the duties that typically fall under this type of role, that is why I proposed a rate lower than the low end of the average.\\\\nhttps://www.salary.com/research/salary/benchmark/controller-hourly-wages\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9bd73bc9ba6ff289e2deb597dd6fe83dc0056af7a2937d6dec119660ba0146a4", "requested_sponsor": "theori.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "920", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 126703301}

Recommend new procedures to improve the proposal payment process.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=185)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

Proposals are flowing timely. New T&C have been implemented eliminating the need to create Ironclad contracts. KYC/B steps during the payment process have been eliminated, which drastically cut down on the steps necessary and the staff necessary to process a proposal payment. \\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 11.5 \\\\nRate: $80/hour\\\\n$920.00\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nRate determination is below the low end of the average hourly contract rate ($87 - $162) for an accountant with the same years of experience. That average rate does not account for my 5 years of blockchain specific experience. I\\\\\\'m not fulfilling all the duties that typically fall under this type of role, that is why I proposed a rate lower than the low end of the average.\\\\nhttps://www.salary.com/research/salary/benchmark/controller-hourly-wages\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9bd73bc9ba6ff289e2deb597dd6fe83dc0056af7a2937d6dec119660ba0146a4", "requested_sponsor": "theori.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "920", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "tfdevhub.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Fin Ops 07/29/2024 - 08/09/2024", "summary": "Oversee that proposals flow thru the payment process efficiently. Recommend new procedures to improve the proposal payment process.", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": null, "description": "Audit and reconciliation of 2024 DevHub proposals submitted for payment processing.  I audit the current system in place, audit the records as they currently exist, propose improvements based on my findings, collaborate to implement an improved process and serve as the ongoing liason between DevHub contributors and NF as it relates to proposal payment processing.\\\\n\\\\nWeek 07/29/24 - 08/02/24 \\\\n07/29/24 - CRM updates, Email, Events updates \\\\n08/01/24 - Emails, Investigate email issues, Mtg w/Ori, Discuss flow change to eliminate AT form for contributor\\\\n08/02/24 - Updates\\\\nTotal 10.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nWeek 08/05/24 - 08/09/24 \\\\n08/07/24 - Email\\\\n08/08/24 - Updates, TG w/Ori \\\\nTotal 3 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal 13.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nResults:\\\\n2024 proposals are reconciled between DevHub portal and CRM. Proposals are flowing timely. New T&C have been implemented eliminating the need to create Ironclad contracts. KYC/B steps during the payment process have been eliminated, which drastically cut down on the steps necessary and the staff necessary to process a proposal payment. We are making another adjustment to the flow process which will eliminate the need for the contributor to complete the airtable payment request form.\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 13.5 \\\\nRate: $80/hour\\\\n$1,080.00\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nRate determination is below the low end of the average hourly contract rate ($87 - $162) for an accountant with the same years of experience. That average rate does not account for my 5 years of blockchain specific experience. I\\\\\\'m not fulfilling all the duties that typically fall under this type of role, that is why I proposed a rate lower than the low end of the average.\\\\nhttps://www.salary.com/research/salary/benchmark/controller-hourly-wages\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9bd73bc9ba6ff289e2deb597dd6fe83dc0056af7a2937d6dec119660ba0146a4", "requested_sponsor": "theori.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1080", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 126703873}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Fin Ops 08/12/2024 - 08/23/2024", "summary": "Oversee that proposals flow thru the payment process efficiently. Recommend new procedures to improve the proposal payment process.", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": null, "description": "Audit and reconciliation of 2024 DevHub proposals submitted for payment processing.  I audit the current system in place, audit the records as they currently exist, propose improvements based on my findings, collaborate to implement an improved process and serve as the ongoing liason between DevHub contributors and NF as it relates to proposal payment processing.\\\\n\\\\nWeek 08/12/24 - 08/16/24 \\\\n08/13/24 - CRM updates, Mtg w/Ori, Email research, Work on new process flow changes \\\\n08/14/24 - Research and reconciliation for process changes\\\\n08/15/24 - Updates, continued reconciliation for process changes\\\\n08/16/24 - Set up Ledger, Mtg w/Ori, Ledger tests\\\\nTotal 14 hours\\\\n\\\\nWeek 08/19/24 - 08/23/24 \\\\n08/20/24 - Updates, TG w/Ori & Dan\\\\n08/21/24 - Updates, Research proposal issues, TG w/Ori\\\\n08/23/24 - Mtg w/Ori\\\\nTotal 5 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal 19 hours\\\\n\\\\nResults:\\\\n2024 proposals are reconciled between DevHub portal and CRM. Proposals are flowing timely. New T&C have been implemented eliminating the need to create Ironclad contracts. KYC/B steps during the payment process have been eliminated, which drastically cut down on the steps necessary and the staff necessary to process a proposal payment. We implemented another adjustment to the flow process which eliminates the need for the contributor to complete the airtable payment request form.\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 19 \\\\nRate: $80/hour\\\\n$1,520.00\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nRate determination is below the low end of the average hourly contract rate ($87 - $162) for an accountant with the same years of experience. That average rate does not account for my 5 years of blockchain specific experience. I\\\\\\'m not fulfilling all the duties that typically fall under this type of role, that is why I proposed a rate lower than the low end of the average.\\\\nhttps://www.salary.com/research/salary/benchmark/controller-hourly-wages\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9bd73bc9ba6ff289e2deb597dd6fe83dc0056af7a2937d6dec119660ba0146a4", "requested_sponsor": "theori.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1520", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 126706323}

{"body": {"name": "Owen DevRel Contributor Report 15 August - 28 August", "summary": "\\\\nBi-weekly paid developer relations contributor report. These activities aim to improve the developer experience in the NEAR ecosystem. ", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "gagdiez.near", "description": "## Timeline\\\\nStart Date: August 12, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd Date: August 25, 2024\\\\n\\\\u{200b}\\\\n## Requested Funding\\\\nHours: 62:55\\\\n\\\\nRate: $50/hour \\\\n\\\\nTotal Amount: $3146\\\\n\\\\n# Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n### Developer and community support \\\\n- 8:30 Supporting developers through Discord, Telegram and office hours.\\\\n- 2:00 Wrapping up Chain Abstraction Community Call #3 [recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5ws01_ut1Q&t=1667s), [notes](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=blog&id=3322) + announcements.\\\\n\\\\n## Contributions\\\\n- 22:00 Working on Auction tutorial series, mainly part 4 FT tutorial, part 5 frontend, and looking at adding nearblocks APIs. [repo](https://github.com/near-examples/auctions-tutorial), [docs](https://github.com/near/docs/pull/2183)\\\\n- 4:00 some fixes to near-mulitchain [repo](https://github.com/near-examples/near-multichain), [docs](https://github.com/near/docs/pull/2216) + looking at updating nft chain keys (cannot be done currently)\\\\n- 2:40 Updating wallet file in examples [PR](https://github.com/near-examples/hello-near-examples/pull/18)\\\\n\\\\n## Content \\\\n- 14:00 Aggregating, writing and pushing out the dev Newsletter + call and organisation with Sasha for new format [week 1](https://t.me/NEARDevHub/280) [week 2](https://t.me/NEARDevHub/284)\\\\n- 7:00 Prep for and hosting DevHub live solo for the first time [recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f9L4I_l2O-g) + particpating in livestream with NF nightshade 2.0 livestream [recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O1gunX1Ml1U)\\\\n\\\\n### General / Other \\\\n- 1:40 DevRel team calls\\\\n- 0:15 One-on-one with manager Guillermo\\\\n- 0:50 Misc activities, little odd jobs like reading updates and messaging with team.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "icespice.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3146", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 126754047}
